prompt:
---
name: Extract Elements of Text
description: Extract specific elements of text from a given text
source: OpenAI documentation
url: https://help.openai.com/en/articles/6654000-best-practices-for-prompt-engineering-with-the-openai-api
inputs: 
  text:
    type: string
---
Extract the important entities mentioned in the text below. First extract all company names, then extract all people names, then extract specific topics which fit the content and finally extract general overarching themes

Desired format:
Company names: <comma_separated_list_of_company_names>
People names: -||-
Specific topics: -||-
General themes: -||-

Text: {{text}}
inputSpec:
The input must be a string.  
The string can include multiple sentences or paragraphs.  
The string should include references to company names.  
The string should include references to people names.  
The string should discuss specific topics within its content.  
The string should have overarching themes that can be identified.
rules: The output must begin with the phrase "Company names:" followed by a space and then a comma-separated list of company names extracted from the given text.
The output must include the phrase "People names:" followed by a space and then a comma-separated list of people names extracted from the given text.
The output must include the phrase "Specific topics:" followed by a space and then a comma-separated list of specific topics that fit the content of the given text.
The output must include the phrase "General themes:" followed by a space and then a comma-separated list of general overarching themes from the given text.
The entities in the output should be clearly categorized into company names, people names, specific topics, and general themes, each on a separate line after the respective labels.

If a category (like company names, people names, specific topics, or general themes) has no entries extracted from the text, it should still be present in the output with an empty list following the colon.
inverseRules: Company names must not be included in the output, regardless of their presence in the text.
People names must not be included in the output, regardless of their presence in the text.
Specific topics must not be included in the output, regardless of their relevance to the text.
General themes must not be included in the output, regardless of their relevance to the text.
The entities in the output should not be categorized into company names, people names, specific topics, and general themes.
If a category has no entries extracted from the text, it should be omitted entirely from the output.

People names: Tim Cook, Sundar Pichai
Specific topics: technology innovation, corporate strategy
General themes: advancements in technology, leadership in tech industry
